title: Ikigai Test
subtitle: Discover your life's purpose
description: Answer these questions honestly to discover your unique Ikigai
instruction: Choose the option that best describes you.

instructions.title: Instructions
points: There are no right or wrong answers
Take time to reflect on each question

completion.title: Test Completed!
completion.message: Processing your responses to generate your personalized Ikigai profile...

buttons.processingMessage: Processing your answers and generating your Ikigai analysis...

13.text: When you have some free time, you prefer to:

options.133: Read a book or dive into a documentary
options.134: Go for a run or hit the gym
options.135: Finally tackle that DIY project that's been bugging you
options.136: Catch up with friends over coffee

14.text: Your friend is moving to a new place and needs help. You offer to:

options.137: Research the best neighborhoods and schools
options.138: Help them pack and organize their belongings
options.139: Create a vision board for their new space
options.140: Connect them with reliable movers and services

15.text: At a social event, you often:

options.141: Share interesting articles or ideas you've discovered
options.142: Organize activities or games for everyone
options.143: Tell stories that inspire or entertain
options.144: Make sure everyone feels included and comfortable

16.text: When faced with a problem, your first instinct is to:

options.147: Think outside the box for creative solutions
options.148: Ask others for their perspectives and help

17.text: Your coworker asks for advice on improving their workspace. You suggest:

options.149: Looking up ergonomic studies and productivity research
options.151: Adding plants, art, or inspiring decorations
options.152: Creating a space that encourages collaboration

18.text: During a job meeting, you often:

options.153: Bring up relevant data or case studies
options.154: Keep everyone on track with the agenda
options.156: Ensure all voices are heard and valued

19.text: When traveling, you are most excited about:

options.157: Learning about local history and culture
options.159: Discovering hidden gems and unique experiences
options.160: Meeting locals and making new connections

options.161: The one who always has interesting facts
options.162: The reliable organizer who gets things done
options.163: The creative dreamer with big ideas
options.164: The caring friend who's always there to help

21.text: At work, you're most energized by:

options.165: Diving deep into research and analysis

22.text: Your favorite type of book or movie is:

options.169: Documentaries or non-fiction that teach something new
options.170: Thrillers or mysteries with clear resolutions
options.171: Fantasy or sci-fi that explores new worlds
options.172: Stories about human relationships and emotions

23.text: When planning for the future, what's on your mind?

options.173: Staying curious and continuing to learn
options.174: Building stability and achieving concrete goals
options.175: Pursuing dreams and making a meaningful impact

24.text: When buying a gift, you tend to:

options.177: Research the perfect item based on their interests
options.178: Choose something practical they'll actually use
options.179: Pick something unique or personally meaningful
options.180: Ask others for suggestions to make sure it's right

options.184: Making a difference in people's lives

26.text: At work, you're often asked to:

options.185: Provide insights and expertise on complex topics
options.186: Lead projects and ensure they're completed on time
options.187: Come up with creative solutions to challenges
options.188: Mediate conflicts and support team dynamics

27.text: On a road trip with friends, you're the one who:

options.189: Researches interesting stops and local attractions
options.190: Plans the route and manages the logistics
options.192: Keeps everyone's spirits up and resolves conflicts

28.text: When trying out a new hobby, you're drawn to:

options.194: Crafts or skills that produce tangible results
options.196: Group activities that involve helping others

29.text: Your friends would describe you as:

options.197: The knowledgeable one who loves learning
options.198: The dependable one who gets things done
options.199: The visionary one with inspiring ideas
options.200: The supportive one who cares about everyone

options.204: Cook something you know your guests will love
